22a1470b-6761-4f7f-a797-f81f751fff28.description: The participant has obtained the foundations of building a strong brand. They understand: the value and elements of a strong brand experience as well as how brands are created. Participants have created: Brand values, Headline benefits, A unique selling point, their brand personality and a tagline
22a1470b-6761-4f7f-a797-f81f751fff28.name: Branding

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a self paced online module (between 1-3 hours)

2b18ce95-7ed7-4954-93f9-38985146f724.description: Through this module the participant has developed an awareness of sustainable development goals, their significance and background. The participant can critically analyse SDG targets and indicators applied under the 17 SDGs. They have developed an awareness of how to access current industry reports and examples to understand SDG impact as well as an ability to use reflect progress toward measuring personal impact against SDGs.
2b18ce95-7ed7-4954-93f9-38985146f724.name: Sustainable Development Goals

badge_template_activities.title: Able to show case understanding of the SDGs through application of own idea.
Complete a self paced online module (between 1-3 hours)

6cca7ff8-25e6-49cd-adab-7e14d02fc73b.description: This participant has had explicit training in the Lean methodology. They know; how to develop the essential components that make up a Value Proposition as well as how to apply that Value Proposition to their own product or idea They understand the importance of creating value for their customer and ensure they will add value with their solution. A participant can perform customer development, discovery and know how to validate their assumptions with their customers to gain insights or learnings
6cca7ff8-25e6-49cd-adab-7e14d02fc73b.name: The Lean Methodology

badge_template_activities.title: Be able to apply the lean methodology to look at stakeholder needs.

1f4a39e5-7eed-40bf-bde7-2d14618f4f4f.description: Our Activate module is a foundational learning that requires you to run your idea or start-up through various stages of customer development, customer validation and prototyping to get you to a business strategy or defined business model
1f4a39e5-7eed-40bf-bde7-2d14618f4f4f.name: Pitch Light

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a self paced online module (between 1-3 hours)

8c2397c5-d03c-4b8e-97a2-0ca017562068.description: Activate allows participants to unpack their own business idea through the Lean methodology within iAccelerate’s framework. It covers the Value Proposition Tool, the Business Model Framework, Entrepreneurship and philosophy the Sustainable Development Goals (SDG’s), Brand, innovation and Pitching.
8c2397c5-d03c-4b8e-97a2-0ca017562068.name: Activate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 8 modules within iAccelerate's Activate program. Lean 1, 2 and 3 (Value Proposition Tool, the Business Model Framework) Entrepreneurship and philosophy the Sustainable Development Goals (SDG’s), Brand, innovation and Pitching.
Work through 3 hours of self-paced learning and attended one 3 hour session per week with peers and Facilitators.
Complete all work which enables a Pitch to Peer presentation on the completion of the course.

737b7980-c415-4e85-8168-30799e7ab880.description: This person has successfully pitched their idea to a panel of iAccelerate experts and their peers. This person are able to pitch online, face-to-face and using technology.
737b7980-c415-4e85-8168-30799e7ab880.name: Pitch Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: Attended two days of training as an extension of the iAccelerate Activate or Grow program.
Present multiple pitches about an idea with a clear ask to an audience within a set time frame.

5ba6032e-7e63-4253-91b4-cff1db2105ec.description: The RISE First Nations is a one-day practical workshop designed specifically for First Nations peoples to provide them with practical tools to take their business idea or existing business further.
5ba6032e-7e63-4253-91b4-cff1db2105ec.name: Rise First Nations Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: iAccelerate Rise First Nations can support businesses and ideas, including: Existing businesses looking to revitalise their strategy to launch new products or services. Startup businesses looking to turn an idea into a business. Not-for-profits and social enterprises looking to make a financially sustainable impact in their community

e99fb896-c2be-4a51-bd99-52fcdc5db03a.description: Accelerate allows participants to move forward with their business idea by continuing with the lean methodology and going in-depth on topics like Values and Leadership, creating a minimum Lovable Product, Digital Strategy, Lean 4: Customer Validation/Testing Selling, Innovative Thinking, and learning how to Pitch their business.
e99fb896-c2be-4a51-bd99-52fcdc5db03a.name: Accelerate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all work that enables a Pitch your Business presentation on the completion of the course.

dcdf7173-c086-4440-8477-4dcb0562aa09.description: The participant has learned about the elements of business positioning and strategy that are critical to launching a successful start-up. They can map competitors, generate a strategic position or develop a business positioning and evaluate different business models.
dcdf7173-c086-4440-8477-4dcb0562aa09.name: Competitor Analysis

bd2fa0ad-5f86-4d7a-b53d-379efbeeb9c8.description: The participant has obtained an understanding of digital strategy and what is most suited to their organisational context. They understand the landscape of digital marketing and the pros and cons of a variety of platforms.
bd2fa0ad-5f86-4d7a-b53d-379efbeeb9c8.name: Digital Strategy

415a938c-f1ed-4559-957e-ce0aac4eb7b8.name: Minimum Lovable Product
